StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: Proc2089
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @PersonId uniqueiden..er, @SSN char(11), @FirstName varchar(75), @LastName varchar(75), @MaidenName varchar(75), @MiddleName varchar(50), @Su.x char(10), @Billet varchar(100), @PayGrade char(2), @Rank varchar(10), @Title varchar(25), @UnitOrCommand varchar(25), @RsOrganiza.onId int, @OssOrganiza.onId int, @DistrictOrganiza.onId int, @RegionOrganiza.onId int ) AS
BEGIN TRANSACTION
IF EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM [ACP].[Person] WHERE [PersonId] = @PersonId) BEGIN
--Update Person UPDATE [ACP].[Person] SET [SSN] = @SSN, [FirstName] = @FirstName, [LastName] = @LastName, [MaidenName] = @MaidenName, [MiddleName] = @MiddleName, [Su.x] = @Su.x WHERE [PersonId] = @PersonId
IF EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM [ACP].[Recruiter] WHERE [PersonId] = @PersonId) BEGIN --Update Recruiter UPDATE [ACP].[Recruiter] SET [Billet] = @Billet, [Rank] = @Rank, [Title] = @Title, [UnitOrCommand] = @UnitOrCommand, [RsOrganiza.onId] = @RsOrganiza.onId, [OssOrganiza.onId] = @OssOrganiza.onId, [DistrictOrganiza.onId] = @DistrictOrganiza.onId, [RegionOrganiza.onId] = @RegionOrganiza.onId WHERE [PersonId] = @PersonId
END END ELSE BEGIN --Insert Person INSERT INTO [ACP].[Person] ([PersonId], [SSN], [FirstName], [LastName], [MaidenName], [MiddleName], [Su.x]) VALUES (@PersonId, @SSN, @FirstName, @LastName, @MaidenName, @MiddleName, @Su.x) --Insert Recruiter INSERT INTO [ACP].[Recruiter] ([PersonId],[Billet],[PayGrade],[Rank],[Title],[UnitOrCommand],[RsOrganiza.onId],[OssOrganizationId],[DistrictOrganiza.onId],[RegionOrganiza.onId]) VALUES (@PersonId,@Billet,@PayGrade,@Rank,@Title,@UnitOrCommand,@RsOrganiza.onId,@OssOrganiza.onId,@DistrictOrganiza.onId,@RegionOrganiza.onId) END
-- Rollback the transac.on if there were any errors IF @@ERROR <> 0 BEGIN -- Rollback the transac.on ROLLBACK TRANSACTION -- Raise an error and return RAISERROR ('Error occurred while performing the change.', 16, 1) RETURN END
-- Rollback the transac.on if the number of rows changed does not meet our expecta.on... IF @@ROWCOUNT > 1 BEGIN -- Rollback the transac.on ROLLBACK TRANSACTION -- Raise an error and return RAISERROR ('An unexpected number of rows were changed.', 16, 1) RETURN END
-- If we reach this point, the commands completed successfully, commit the transac.on COMMIT TRANSACTION
